nodes.text: Star Wars: Armada is a miniatures game from Fantasy Flight Games. It is a two player game focused on space combat between the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance. The base set contains ten squadrons of TIE Fighters and X-Wings, die, cards, and painted models for a Victory-class Star Destroyer, CR90 Corvette, and a Nebulon-B Frigate.
Wave I expansions, aside from separate releases of the vessels already present in the Base pack, add a Assault Frigate Mark II, Gladiator-class Star Destroyer, and various squadrons of starfighters.

Wave II added expansion packs featuring the Imperial-class Star Destroyer, the MC30c Frigate, the Home One, various small-ships in the Rogues and Villains, and the Imperial Raider, the last of which had previously been announced as an expansion pack for X-Wing Miniatures.
Wave III added expansion packs featuring the Gozanti Assault Carriers and the GR-75 Medium Trransports.
Wave IV added expansion packs for the Interdictor-class Star Destroyer and the MC80 Liberty type Star Cruiser.
Wave VI added expansion packs featuring Sphyrna-class Hammerhead corvette and the Quasar Fire-class cruiser-carrier.
Wave VII added expansion packs featuring the Chimaera and the Profundity flagships.
